name: EXCLUSIVE BLOOD BANK
description: The blood bank plays an important role in patient care. Transfusion-related errors have serious consequence for
largeDescription: Blood bank testing should start with a type and screen. Note that a type and screen is valid for 3 days. A negative screen denotes that the patient does not have preformed antibodies. A positive screen means that the blood bank will require additional time to determine the nature of the antibody; if the antibody is considered to be clinically significant, the blood bank will have to find corresponding antigen-negative blood. See the chapter “Blood Bank Testing and Blood Products” for an in-depth discussion on blood bank testing.
